alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 3:41AM CDT until March 13 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Fond du Lac and Sheboygan Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be a long duration snowfall event and snowfall rates will be light this morning into the mid afternoon. This advisory mainly targets higher snowfall accumulation rates that will occur late in the afternoon into tonight, which will cause greater travel impacts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
